title: AT&T Mobility LLC v. Concepcion
summary: The Court held the FAA preempts California's Discover Bank rule; class-action waivers in arbitration agreements are enforceable.

title: Riley v. California
summary: Police generally may not, without a warrant, search digital information on a cellphone seized incident to arrest.

title: Epic Games, Inc. v. Apple, Inc.
summary: On Epic's appeal, the Ninth Circuit affirmed the district court's denial of antitrust liability and addressed errors in market definition; affirmed in part with other issues remanded/adjusted.
